name: Ode to Caress and Cicatrix
simple_desc: Regenerates Energy for one designated ally character and turns the target and their summon into "The Beatified." "The Beatified" increases their CRIT DMG.
desc:
Regenerates Energy by #1[f1]% of Max Energy for one designated ally character, and turns the target and their summon into "The Beatified." "The Beatified" have their CRIT DMG increased by an amount equal to #2[f1]% of Sunday's CRIT DMG plus #4[f1]%.
At the start of Sunday's each turn, the duration of "The Beatified" decreases by 1 turn, lasting for a total of #3[i] turn(s). And it only takes effect on the most recent target of the Ultimate (excluding Sunday himself). When Sunday is knocked down, "The Beatified" will also be dispelled.
